definition[0]: to cut something into smaller pieces
example[0]: He went outside to chop some more wood for the fire.
example[1]: Can you chop up some carrots for me?
example[2]: Add two finely chopped onions and a clove of garlic.
example[3]: Chop the meat into small cubes.
definition[1]: to reduce an amount of money by a large amount
example[4]: He suddenly found that his income had been chopped in half.
definition[2]: a small piece of meat on a bone, usually cut from a sheep or pig
definition[3]: a hard downward movement that you make with your hand
definition[4]: the act of hitting something with a sharp tool in order to cut it
example[7]: With one last chop he split the log in two.
